This removes another stray bit from last week's merge.

throw away countries which are not described in campaigns-data.js

when campaigns get added we automatically pick them up and list them
on the first page. However if the campaigns-data.js has not been updated
when a photo is uploaded an error is thrown as there is no way to know
what license and template to upload them under.

instead throw these campaigns away so they are not surfaced in the app
log to console so this problem can be identified. this signals that
you need to run python scripts/generate_campaigns.py

run python scripts/generate_campaigns.py

pick up newly added campaigns

Use thumbnails in uploads list

For completed thumbnails, using ImageFetcher to fetch thumbnails via API. Note this will fail on items saved before application of the '.jpg' extension.
For incomplete thumbnails, we load the images and scale them into canvases, which should leave the images as discardable once they've been loaded and save memory/time redrawing.
Wrong aspect ratio on these, should be fixed...

add checkboxes to incomplete upload items

Basic caching for uploads lists, so we don't have to redraw them when uploads haven't changed.

This reduces spinners on the 'completed' page and delays on the 'incomplete' page if you have a lot of photos it takes a couple seconds to load the images and draw thumbs.

generalise location retrieval (includes bug 38924)

there are 3 obvious places for a user to provide their location
1) from use my current location
2) from wanting to sort the results list to show monuments closest to them
3) from clicking the locate me button on the map

creates a getPosition function in app.js which generalises location retrieval
enables the distance button (although disabled) with extra handling when first
clicked to find

hide distance calculation for monuments further than 200km away

it's not helping anyone :-)
